item.description:
**Sunday Nite Dance Party - Melody Lane Party Room at Cherry Street Restaurant, Wallingford, CT

AGE GROUP * 30’s * 40’s * 50’s

Visit http://www.CentralCTS... for more info or call (860) 236-3343

SUNDAY Sept 20
SUNDAY Sept 27
SUNDAY Oct 4
SUNDAY Oct 11
SUNDAY Oct 18
SUNDAY Oct 25

Enjoy FREE Appetizers and DJ Dance Music and requests in the brand NEW Melody Lane Party Room!

The Party starts at 7 pm

In the beautiful NEW
Melody Lane Party Room at the
Cherry Street Restaurant,
428 South Cherry Street
Wallingford, CT 06492
(203) 741-1113

Join Central CT Singles And Hundreds Of Local Singles

Dance The Night Away -Meet Someone Special And Party With Central CT Singles

“Singles Dances provide the opportunity to meet many local singles all in one place!
So if you dance, don't dance, or just want to party with other local singles and meet someone special,
and check out the next Central CT Singles Dance Party”

* DRESS TO IMPRESS *

SUMMER SPECIAL - Tickets are only $10 at the door - 2 Tickets for $15 ONLINE ONLY
CLICK PAY NOW AND USE CREDIT OR DEBIT CARD


Visit http://www.CentralCTS... for more info or call (860) 236-3343

Your Ticket Includes:

* Appetizers *
* DJ Dance Music and Requests *
* Plenty of FREE Safe Parking *

Check Out Our Ads In The Hartford Courant and on the Internet

Visit http://www.CentralCTS... for more info or call (860) 236-3343

For Directions, Visit http://www.mapquest.c...

DIRECTIONS FROM HARTFORD (30 miles)

Take 91 South to CT-15 S/WILBUR CROSS PKWY via EXIT 17
Take EXIT 64 toward WALLINGFORD
Turn RIGHT onto QUINNIPIAC ST.
Stay STRAIGHT to go onto WARD ST.
At the light, take a RIGHT on to S. Cherry Street
Cherry Street Restaurant is ½ mile down on your Left
Enter the Melody Lane Party Room through the patio entrance on the left side

DIRECTIONS FROM NEW HAVEN: (11 Miles)
Take 91 North
Take EXIT 13 on the LEFT toward US-5/WALLINGFORD/NORTH HAVEN.
Merge onto WHARTON BROOK CONN
Turn RIGHT onto S COLONY RD/US-5
Turn LEFT onto JOHN ST.
Turn LEFT onto S CHERRY ST
Cherry Street Restaurant is ½ mile down on your Left
Enter the Melody Lane Party Room through the patio entrance on the left side

SEE YOU AT THE PARTY!

UPCOMING EVENTS:


Sunday, Sept 20 -Sunday Nite Dance Party – 7pm The NEW Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 South Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 Includes DJ Dance Music and Appetizers SUMMER SPECIAL Tickets are $10 at event, 2 for $15 online at http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343

Thursday, Sept 24 -Professional Singles Nite with Magic Table -7pm to closing, Shade Bar and grille at the DoubleTree Hotel (next to Bradley Intl Airport, 16 Ella Grasso Turnpike, Windsor Locks, CT 06096 Professional Dress - No Jeans, Sneakers, T-shirts. Includes Appetizers. Tickets are $15 at event, $10 online at http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343

Saturday, Sept 26 – 7:30 RACHMANINOFF PIANO CONCERTI with the CT Theatre Group at the Bushnell Theatre 166 Capitol Avenue Hartford, CT 06106 Get the Group Discount Ticket Rate at http://www.CTTheatreG... or cal (860) 987-7888

Sunday, Sept 27 -Sunday Nite Dance Party – 7pm The NEW Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 South Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 Includes DJ Dance Music and Appetizers SUMMER SPECIAL Tickets are $10 at event, 2 for $15 online at http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343

Sunday, Oct 4 -Sunday Nite Dance Party – 7pm The NEW Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 South Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 Includes DJ Dance Music and Appetizers SUMMER SPECIAL Tickets are $10 at event, 2 for $15 online at http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343

Sunday, Oct 11 -Sunday Nite Dance Party – 7pm The NEW Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 South Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 Includes DJ Dance Music and Appetizers SUMMER SPECIAL Tickets are $10 at event, 2 for $15 online at http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343

Wednesday Oct 14 - Professional Singles Nite with Magic Table -7pm to closing at the NEW Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 South Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 Professional Dress - No Jeans, Sneakers, T-shirts. Includes Appetizers. Tickets are $15 at event, $10 online at http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343

Friday Oct 16 Bus Trip To Mohegan Sun with Buffet and Concert with the 70's Band WAR includes Buffet and $20 of Casino money. Bus pickup in Windsor and Glastonbury Advance tickets are only $25 until Oct 11 2009 Visit http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343 for more info

Sunday, Oct 18 -Sunday Nite Dance Party – 7pm The NEW Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 South Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 Includes DJ Dance Music and Appetizers SUMMER SPECIAL Tickets are $10 at event, 2 for $15 online at http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343

Wednesday, Oct 21 7pm Galactic Bowling Nite at Spare - Spare Time Bristol, 177 Farmington Ave (Route 6), Bristol, CT 06010 UNLIMITED GALACTIC BOWLING from 7pm to 11pm, includes shoes, and Pizza Tickets are $15 at the events, $10 online at http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343

Sunday, Oct 24 – 8pm CLUB SWING with the CT Theatre Group at the Bushnell Theatre 166 Capitol Avenue Hartford, CT 06106 Get the Group Discount Ticket Rate at http://www.CTTheatreG... or cal (860) 987-7888

Sunday, Oct 25 -Sunday Nite Dance Party – 7pm The NEW Melody Lane Party Room at the Cherry Street Restaurant, 428 South Cherry Street, Wallingford, CT 06492 Includes DJ Dance Music and Appetizers SUMMER SPECIAL Tickets are $10 at event, 2 for $15 online at http://www.CentralCTS... Info: (860) 236-3343
